tvmega_recap: Mallet and Dinah decide to date each other exclusively Mallet interviews for a new partner, but no one is as good a match as Gus. Reva and Cassie chat at R.J.'s Valentine's Day play, mending fences. Reva asks Josh if he wants to hang with her on the holiday, but he turns her down. Tammy and Jonathan decide to get a place together; Tammy fills Reva in on their plans. Sandy sends Tammy a valentine, but Jonathan intercepts it and threatens Sandy's life, which Sandy gets on tape. After Jeffrey has a horse-riding accident, he tells Mel (thinking she's Cassie) that he slept with her when he was posing as Jeffrey. Mel is unsure whether to tell or not.
